reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Kyrgyz Republic

description.narrative: The project will establish a development center in Osh city for HIV-positive children living in Osh oblast in Kyrgyzstan. It will prepare children for school and life with HIV as well as educate their parents on various issues related to living with HIV-po sitive children. To contribute to the establishment of a supportive environment for HIV-positive children an educational seminar will be organized for journalists. In cooperation with universities 24 students will get practical training at the center.
